column2: Hey! So I prepared this special challenge just for you in Fizzics. Think you can beat it?
Good. Launch the Fizzics app and let's play!
Remember? Click that Fizzics icon and let's go.
You're already running Fizzics. Bring it up and let's play!
Okay. See those 20 spiky balls? Your goal is to change whatever you can so they don't touch each other.
Just stacking them up won't be enough. You're going to need to get in there and change some settings.
A smaller ball has more space to move around!
Also, when you freeze balls, they don't move anymore.
Hey, wait! Nice try, but you need to keep at least 20 spiky balls. Otherwise it doesn't count.
Yay! Really cool solution. I didn't think of that one. You've got a talent for this!
Wait! I think this key must have fallen out of Saniel's pocket. Hang onto it. I think we're gonna need it.
Sweet! Come find me at the Clubhouse whenever.
No prob. Holler at me in the Clubhouse and we can try it some other time!
